languages.text: "Нет-нет! Мы тут не для того, чтобы ты молчал — визжи, да погромче!" {n}Толпа подхватывает выкрик наглеца, требуя криков и воплей.{/n}
"Oh, no no no! We didn't come here for you to stay quiet! Squeal now, and squeal louder!" {n}The crowd takes up the fool's outburst and begins demanding more screams.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Нет-нет! Мы тут не для того, чтобы ты молчал — визжи, да погромче!" {n}Толпа подхватывает выкрик наглеца, требуя криков и воплей.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Oh no-no-no! We did not come here for you to stay mum! Squeal now, and squeal louder!" {n}The crowd picks up on the clown's impudence, demanding screams and shouts.{/n}

languages.text: “噢，这可不行！我们把你带过来，可不是为了让你连大气都不喘！赶紧叫起来！大点声！”{n}人群应和着小丑尖锐的声音，渴望听到台上的人凄惨的尖叫。{/n}
languages.original_text: "Oh, no no no! We didn't come here for you to stay quiet! Squeal now, and squeal louder!" {n}The crowd takes up the fool's outburst and begins demanding more screams.{/n}

traits.locale_text: “噢，这可不行！我们把你带过来，可不是为了让你连大气都不喘！赶紧叫起来！大点声！”{n}人群应和着小丑尖锐的声音，渴望听到台上的人凄惨的尖叫。{/n}
“噢，这可不行！我们把你带过来，可不是为了让你叨叨咕咕的！赶紧惨叫起来！大点声！”{n}人群应和着小丑尖锐的声音，渴望台上的人高声惨叫。{/n}

languages.text: «¡Oh, no, no, no! ¡No nos hemos reunido aquí para que te lo calles todo! ¡Chilla ahora, y chilla fuerte!». {n}El público se une al descontento del bufón y comienza a exigir más gritos.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Oh, no no no! We didn't come here for you to stay quiet! Squeal now, and squeal louder!" {n}The crowd takes up the fool's outburst and begins demanding more screams.{/n}

traits.locale_text: «¡Oh, no, no, no! ¡No nos hemos reunido aquí para que te lo calles todo! ¡Chilla ahora, y chilla fuerte!». {n}El público se une al descontento del bufón y comienza a exigir más gritos.{/n}
«¡Oh, no, no, no! ¡No nos hemos reunido aquí para que te muerdas la lengua! ¡Chilla ahora, y chilla fuerte!». {n}El público se une al descontento del bufón y comienza a exigir más gritos.{/n}

languages.text: "Yok! Yok öyle şey! Buraya sessiz kalasın diye gelmedik! Ciyakla şimdi, daha sesli hem de!" {n}Kalabalık, soytarının patlamasını benimseyip daha fazla çığlık duymayı talep ediyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Oh, no no no! We didn't come here for you to stay quiet! Squeal now, and squeal louder!" {n}The crowd takes up the fool's outburst and begins demanding more screams.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Yok! Yok öyle şey! Buraya sessiz kalasın diye gelmedik! Ciyakla şimdi, daha sesli hem de!" {n}Kalabalık, soytarının patlamasını benimseyip daha fazla çığlık duymayı talep ediyor.{/n}

languages.text: 「あぁ、いやいや！我々はお前が黙っているためにここに来たわけじゃないぞ！叫べ、もっと叫べ！」{n}群衆は道化の煽りに応じ、さらなる叫びを求め始める。{/n}
languages.original_text: "Oh, no no no! We didn't come here for you to stay quiet! Squeal now, and squeal louder!" {n}The crowd takes up the fool's outburst and begins demanding more screams.{/n}

traits.locale_text: 「あぁ、いやいや！我々はお前が黙っているためにここに来たわけじゃないぞ！叫べ、もっと叫べ！」{n}群衆は道化の煽りに応じ、さらなる叫びを求め始める。{/n}
「あぁ、いやいや！我々はお前が黙っているためにここに来たわけじゃないぞ！叫べ、もっと叫べ！」{n}群衆は道化の煽りに応じ、さらなる叫びを求め始める。{/n}

languages.text: « Oh, non, non et non ! On n'est pas venus jusqu'ici pour que tu avales ta langue ! Couine, maudit pourceau, couine, et plus fort que ça ! » {n}Aiguillonnée par le coup d'éclat du bouffon, la foule avide de hurlements terrorisés se répand en invectives.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Oh, no no no! We didn't come here for you to stay quiet! Squeal now, and squeal louder!" {n}The crowd takes up the fool's outburst and begins demanding more screams.{/n}

« Oh, non, non et non ! On n'est pas venus jusqu'ici pour que tu avales ta langue ! Couine, maudit pourceau, couine, et plus fort que ça ! » {n}Aiguillonnée par le coup d'éclat du bouffon, la foule avide de hurlements terrorisés se répand en invectives.{/n}

languages.text: "Oh nein, nein, nein! Wir sind nicht gekommen, damit Ihr schweigt! Quiekt schon! Und quiekt lauter!" {n}Die Menge greift den Ausbruch des Narren auf und fordert mehr Schreie.{/n}
